Reviews.Title: overall happy
Reviews.Author: angelfox91401
Reviews.Content: The phone had a few more scratches than described but is in good working condition. overall happy with my pruchase

Reviews.Title: terrible phone
Reviews.Author: Lilac
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone and do not purchase used!!! It came with two batteries one lasted two seconds the other two hours and the charger was broken and i was displeased with the product

Reviews.Title: its ok
Reviews.Author: Autumn
Reviews.Content: it would make a great kids phone, the battery case on the phone i recieved didnt fit very well. its easy to use.

Reviews.Title: problem with the back cover
Reviews.Author: Mamie Barhorst
Reviews.Content: I gave the pantech 700 this rating because it is easy to use and I like how it open up like a laptop. What I dislike is, the back will not stay on other then that it is the perfect phone for me!

Reviews.Title: Broken
Reviews.Author: Darryl Corder
Reviews.Content: Non-Functional. Does not function, believe battery is dead. Not worth the trouble to return it. will not purchase any more used phones from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: Kathleen K. Rodgers
Reviews.Content: Easy to use...buttons respond without hesitation.  Very few blemishes (as described). Good sound. Gee, I need 4 more words before submitting!

Reviews.Title: Good price for what it is
Reviews.Author: Bri Coburn
Reviews.Content: Compared to the phones out now....obviously this phone isn't super fascinating, but its easy to text on, the pink is cute, and for a temporary phone it was a great purchase. It wasn't scratched that bad at all so $32 was a steal! I gave it to my mother in law and its easy for her to use and hasn't complained about anything malfunctioning.

Reviews.Title: Pantech Impact p7000 smart cell phone
Reviews.Author: Rachael M Bellamy
Reviews.Content: I returned the phone two weeks ago...I have not recieved new phone in return or money back. Not a good shopping experience. Money down the drain. I emailed the company severval times with getting no real response of what happened. Do not shop there onless you want to lose your money. Bad experience.

Reviews.Title: Pantech?  More like Pathetic.
Reviews.Author: B. Colonna
Reviews.Content: I have owned several different Pantech phones on my family plan. Almost all run into various issues, all needed to be exchanged when under warranty, and once out of warranty, Pantech support is minimal at best. Read the other reviews. This model is no exception. It is riddled with design defects that Pantech ignores.....battery covers that won't stay on, phones that shut off by themselves.Only one Pantech model has performed well, the Pursuit/Pursuit II. Every other, most notably the Impact and the Link - AWFUL.I won't even go into the features, as this is just a bad phone and you should avoid it.We maintain our phones and keep them protected, not mistreated - this are just junk. And if you call Pantech, even willing to buy replacement parts, like battery doors, they tend to have no spare parts, probably because they get used up replacing all the defects.

Reviews.Title: Great little phone!
Reviews.Author: Kay
Reviews.Content: I've had this phone for about 8 months bought directly from at&t;, I had to purchase this particular one ever since my dog got a hold of the first one. This one is great! I even bought the slightly used version and not a scratch on it! Will definitely buy from them again if need be!

Reviews.Title: Sue
Reviews.Author: Parent
Reviews.Content: Phone broke after 2 months.  Hinge to the keyboard is very weak.  If the hinge breaks the phone is unoperable.  This is what happened to us. and AT&T; would not cover this under their warranty!!!

Reviews.Title: very happy
Reviews.Author: Heather
Reviews.Content: 1st time I have ever ordered a cell phone Online! It came way fast and totally charged. My 10 year old was super excited to try her new pink phone. I only wish I would have ordered one for Me!  :-)  This phone is way easy and amazing. Only down fall is the back cover is hard to get on once u insert the At&t; sim. Other than that the phone is awesome and will for sure buy from this company Again!  :-)

Reviews.Title: not a good phone
Reviews.Author: ugh.
Reviews.Content: i didn't actually by the phone here, but had it for 2 years. horrible phone. scratches easily, turns off for no reason,battery last for like 3 hours after charging all night. if your getting a phone on this site, get a good one like the droid. and there cheaper on here then this one.

Reviews.Title: pantech phone
Reviews.Author: amo user
Reviews.Content: This phone has served my teenager well. Great value for a first phone. The outside screen was  scratched from wear but other than that it was in great condition.

Reviews.Title: pantech p7000
Reviews.Author: karen
Reviews.Content: I bought a Pantech P7000 cell phone from you. It came quickly and with two batteries plus charger. I'm very pleased with my purchase and have had no problems from it. the only complaint I have is the battery cover doesn't fit properly. But that's no biggie to me. I love my phone, thank you!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Martha
Reviews.Content: Great service, great phone I will definetly come back and buy more.  The service was great phone arrived on time and in great condition everything I was expecting.

Reviews.Title: Great as a backup phone
Reviews.Author: Daphney
Reviews.Content: I have this as a back up phone if I lose or break my IPhone. I have used it for 2 weeks straight and had no complaints. I would recommend for younger kids or a teen starting off with a cell phone.

Reviews.Title: Amatuer
Reviews.Author: Renee Salani
Reviews.Content: I wanted a differant phone without spending a lot of money, this is a refurbished phone. I am an amature...not too swift with these gadgets. This phone is easy for this "40 something" mom to play with.

Reviews.Title: Pantech Impact
Reviews.Author: Disappointed in Alabama
Reviews.Content: Got this for my daughter trying to replace one that she had from the local AT&T; store in ourarea.  It came in a timely manner, was perfect in appearance, but immediately showed to nottake a charge...cant use it...costs around $130.00...money down the drain!

Reviews.Title: Good for texting, not as good for talking
Reviews.Author: S.S. "S.S."
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone straight from at&t; a little less than two years ago. This phone is good for texting. I like that it sorts text messages into conversations based on who you're talking to. My biggest problem with this phone is the touchscreen on the outside number pad. It locks except for when you are on the phone, so I frequently hang up on people by brushing the end key on accident, especially when I try to prop the phone against my ear so I can use both hands and still hear the person I'm talking to because the speaker phone isn't that great. Overall, the call quality of this phone is mediocre, but if you don't call much and just want to text, it's a great phone. I've never had it freeze, though the battery covers are flimsy. I've broken 2 of them since I've had this phone.

Reviews.Title: No headphone jack!
Reviews.Author: Jhansi
Reviews.Content: This device has a memory card slot and a music player but no way to plug in a standard pair of headphones!  You are required to add an accessory adapter that sticks too far out the top of the phone just to listen to music with it.  This device is about 10yrs behind the times.  Don't bother with it.

Reviews.Title: Advantage Wireless
Reviews.Author: Debi
Reviews.Content: We received our phone in 2 days.  It works great.  We had a concern and Advantage Wireless contacted us immediately.  Great customer service.

Reviews.Title: can't hear it ring . . .
Reviews.Author: Heart "CSGreen"
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone and it didn't have MP3 ringtones but I choked it up and ignored it, but when I couldn't hear it ring, while in my pants pocket, while sitting in my own home, I pitched it and let soemone else pick it up for texting capabilities . . . what a waste, but I did think it was pretty in pink.

Reviews.Title: Hate the phone
Reviews.Author: mama
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone last month. I absolutely hate it. You can not read the key board the letters are so light. The phone freezes all the time then when I tried to return I was told it was unreturnable.

Reviews.Title: Phone review
Reviews.Author: Jimmy
Reviews.Content: The phone arrived in the mail quicker than most anything I have bought online and my daughter loves it. It was easy to use and switch into my daughters phone plan. Excellant all around.

Reviews.Title: my cell phone
Reviews.Author: bigmama
Reviews.Content: i like my cellphone it was nice thank you, when i go shopping all the girls like it plus it stands for all the women who fight the fight with breast cancer

ProductInfo.Features:
Digital Audio Recorder
AT&T;
Bluetooth
2 megapixel Camera
WCDMA (UMTS) / GSM 850/900/1800/1900
ProductInfo.Name: Pantech Impact P7000 Unlocked GSM Cell Phone with OLED Touchscreen Dialing Pad + QWERTY Keyboard - Pink
